OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Name: Show disposition for GMs
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will indicate by color the disposition of the combatant.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Name: Show disposition for players
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_DISPOSITION_F.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will indicate by color the disposition of the combatant.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_NAME_MASKIN.Name: Enable name masking
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_NAME_MASKIN.Hint: When checked, GMs can toggle masking the name of combatants for non-GMs in the Combat Tracker.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_NAM.Name: Add NPC combatants with name masked
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_NAM.Hint: When checked, adding a NPC token to the Combat Tracker will have its name masked for non-GMs.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_HID.Name: Add NPC combatants as hidden
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ADD_COMBATANTS_HID.Hint: When checked, adding a NPC token to the Combat Tracker will be added as hidden.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT.Name: Enable obscure combatant
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will display token/information on NPC tokens based on setttings and ownership. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Name: Obscure combatant by visibility
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will display token/information on NPC tokens based on their visibility. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Name: Obscure combatant by disposition
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_OBSCURE_COMBATANT_.Hint: When checked, the Combat Tracker will display token/information on NPC tokens based on their disposition. Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked. Applies for non-GMs only.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_REVERSE_INITIATIVE.Name: Reverse initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_REVERSE_INITIATIVE.Hint: Reverse the sorting order for initiative so that lowest goes first.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DUPLICATE_C.Name: Duplicate combatant
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_DUPLICATE_C.Hint: Add a 'Duplicate Combatant' context menu item in the Combat Tracker that allows each token to have multiple combatants to give the possibility to get multiple actions in the same round.

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_INITIATIVE_.Name: Initiative input field
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_ENABLE_INITIATIVE_.Hint: Replace the normal initiative value with an input field

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_F.Name: Show FRIENDLY combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_F.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_N.Name: Show NEUTRAL combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_N.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_H.Name: Show HOSTILE combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_H.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_S.Name: Show SECRET combatants initiative
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_INITIATIVES_S.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_FR.Name: Show FRIENDLY combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_FR.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NE.Name: Show NEUTRAL combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NE.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_HO.Name: Show HOSTILE combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_HO.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_SE.Name: Show SECRET combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_SE.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NP.Name: Show NPCs combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NP.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked

OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NO.Name: Show non-NPCs combatants
OPTION_COMBAT_TRACKER_SHOW_COMBATANTS_NO.Hint: Only used if [Enable obscure combatant] is checked
